content.text:
# Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Reality Program__disambig_1

The Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Reality Program was a category award handed out annually at the Creative Arts Emmy Award ceremony.
In 2014, Outstanding Reality Program was separated into two categories â€“ Outstanding Structured Reality Program and Outstanding Unstructured Reality Program.
